Summary: Came out of trees and took off.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Columbiaville
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy friend and i were sitting around a fire and looking around the sky and a glowing sphere came straight up out of the woods and headed south for about a quarter mile and then headed due west and went up toward the sky and about a minute later another one came out of the same trees and took the same path as the first one. There were actually four witnesses that i talk to later. On July 7th at the same time at night, it happened again. The only difference was that they went east instead of west.
